psd.parser
Class PsdParser

java.lang.Object
  psd.parser.PsdParser

public class PsdParser
extends java.lang.Object

The Class PsdParser parses a psd file and fills a PsdFile Object accordingly.

Field Summary
private static java.util.logging.Logger logger
          The logger.
private  PsdImage psdObject
          The psd object that shall be filled.
private  PsdInputStream psdStream
          The psd file input stream.

setupLayersGroups

private void setupLayersGroups()
Build layer tree. The following layer types exist:

normal (contained layer or not nested)
folder (container layer)
hidden layers (can be contained layer, too)
